item.name: Launcher Mode
item.item:
Launcher Mode v2 Open apps by shortcut keys.
Usage:
Enable launcher mode by O key. (Remember as "O"pen apps.) * Open "Activity Monitor" by "O down -> A down -> A up". * Open "Mail" by "O down -> M down -> M up". And you can open other apps by similar way.
You can also open apps by holding O+A keys down. (You can adjust timeout by "__BlockUntilKeyUp__ Timeout" in Parameters tab.
List:
* Activity Monitor: O+A key * Search a selected text by Dictionary: O+Q key * Dictionary: O+Q,Q (press Q twice) * Show desktop: O+D key * DigitalColor Meter: O+D,D (press D twice) * Launchpad: O+Space key * Mail: O+M key * Mission Control: O+Tab key * Finder: O+F key * Open Desktop by Finder: O+F,D key * Open the home folder by Finder: O+F,F (press F twice) * Safari: O+S key * Stickies: O+S,S (press S twice) * Terminal: O+T key * TextEdit: O+E key * Xcode: O+X key * iPhone Simulator: O+X,X (press X twice)
